long_description: The Timbuk2 Catapult Messenger Bag is a mini messenger sling that does double duty-it cradles your tablet-size laptop in plush comfort, while repurposing your U-lock as a bag latch. Slip your U-lock (not included) through the front loops, which act as a holster; the lock is conveniently at your fingertips when you hop off your bike. Bag secures closed with rip-and-stick patches along the inside of the flap while your U-lock is busy keeping your bike safe. Internal tricot-lined padded sleeve fits up to an 11 in. laptop. The Timbuk2 Catapult Messenger Bag has room for your peripherals, essentials and a light jacket. Memory-adjust cam buckle eliminates daily fit adjustments; simply unclick the cam, put the bag over your shoulder and lock the cam back in for a perfect fit every time. Fits most standard-width U-Lock sizes ranging from large to mini. Closeout.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Catapult Messenger Bag is a mini messenger sling that does double duty-it cradles your tablet-size laptop in plush comfort, while repurposing your U-lock as a bag latch.
